string.text: 奥尔夫请求: 找到三个所需物品

The Monolith mechanic asked you to find all information possible with regards to working on specific mechanical devices, The info is sketchy but it seems that you will need to search the service centre buildings in Pripyat. There should be three relevant documents.
奥尔夫请求: 剩下两个
You have found one of the schematics leaving 2 more to find.
奥尔夫请求: 剩下两个
You have got one of the schematic's now find the other's.
奥尔夫请求: 剩下两个
You have one now find the other two schematic's.
奥尔夫请求: 找到最后一个
You have two of the documents now find the last one.
奥尔夫请求: 寻找最后一个
You have found two of the three schematics leaving just one to go.
奥尔夫请求: 搜索最后一个
You've found two lots and need to find the last one.
奥尔夫请求: 送回顾客要求的物品
Take all the documents you found to the Monolith mechanic.
